message: I live in Mt. Pleasant -- one of the secrets has to be the Pollo Sabroso restaurant.  Dirt cheap and delicious

@davidtspf  Hi, I LOVE good coffee.  And MidCity Caffe's vanilla latte is simply unsurpassed anywhere (and I have tasted great local coffees in Brazil, Kenya, Rwanda, Italy, Istanbul, Paris, Madrid, Tegucigalpa....) It really is that good. :)
